name: Overclockers Dark  with New Logo
description:
This is a slight modification of the userstyle Overclockers - Dark v1.3 to include the new logo of OCUK and replace the previous logo used. 


Original theme http://userstyles.org/styles/10304
The original creators go to: Rob Miller, Barney Lockwood, FamFamFam & t31os


I did not create this theme, just modified it so the new OcUK logo would be displayed rather than the previous logo.
